Project Source

Gallic Ceremony

A class project of a gallic ceremony and complex sword attachment system reconstitution, where the player is in the skin of a Gallic Soldier in Virtual Reality. The point is to re-make the system in 3D from a computed tomography, and discover how does this sword system works by interacting with it.
